alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:20PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Converse County through 700 PM MDT... At 619 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Glenrock, or 16 miles east of Casper, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Glenrock, Rolling Hills, Rolling Hills Estates, Laprele Reservoir, Deer Creek and Boxelder. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 134 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
